name: Juanje Juega in Sinverland
overview: Another game has surfaced which is rather unique, as it also has nods to other classics for the C64, is Picaro Games C64 release of ' Juanje Juega in Sinverland '; a new platformer whereby you must traverse many different levels, avoid deadly enemies and collect items which have been taken straight out of other great classics such as Pacman, Bruce Lee and even ET.
